data.event: Hollywood was a small community in 1870 and was incorporated as a municipality in 1903.

event.title: merged with the city of Los Angeles in 1910

data.event: It officially merged with the city of Los Angeles in 1910, and soon thereafter a prominent film industry began to emerge, eventually becoming the most recognizable film industry in the world.
In 1853, one adobe hut stood in Nopalera (Nopal field), named for the Mexican Nopal cactus indigenous to the area.

event.title: known as the "Father of Hollywood", on his honeymoon in 1886

data.event: According to the diary of H. J. Whitley, known as the "Father of Hollywood", on his honeymoon in 1886 he stood at the top of the hill looking out over the valley.
